tables.name: observation_period
tables.description: Continuous spans of observable time per person.

tables.name: visit_detail
tables.description: Sub-visit segments within a visit (e.g., bed/ward moves).

tables.name: device_exposure
tables.description: Uses or application of medical devices.

tables.name: observation
tables.description: Generic clinical facts not captured elsewhere.

tables.name: payer_plan_period
tables.description: Spans of payer and plan enrollment.

tables.name: condition_era
tables.description: Aggregated spans of the same condition concept for a person.

tables.name: drug_era
tables.description: Aggregated spans of drug exposure for a specific drug concept.

columns.name: gap_days
columns.description: Gap days between exposures within era.

tables.name: dose_era
tables.description: Aggregated spans of a drug exposure at a specific dose and unit.

tables.name: cost
tables.description: Costs and charges associated with clinical events.

columns.name: cost_event_id
columns.description: ID of the event being costed (domain-specific).

columns.name: cost_domain_id
columns.description: Domain of the event (e.g., Visit, Procedure).

notes: cost_event_id + cost_domain_id point to a row in the domain table indicated by cost_domain_id (polymorphic reference).

tables.name: care_site
tables.description: Physical location of care delivery units (e.g., wards, clinics).

tables.name: fact_relationship
notes: fact_id_1 and fact_id_2 reference rows in the domain indicated by domain_concept_id_1/2 (polymorphic references).

tables.name: cohort
tables.description: Patient membership and time spans for cohort definitions.
notes: Logical key often uses (cohort_definition_id, subject_id, cohort_start_date). Subject domain may vary by definition but is typically Person.

tables.name: cohort_attribute
tables.description: Attributes attached to cohort membership episodes.

columns.name: cohort_initiation_date
columns.description: Date cohort becomes valid for use.

tables.name: person_linkages
tables.description: Helper: repeated person_id foreign keys across clinical tables.
notes: Tables referencing person.person_id include visit_occurrence, visit_detail, condition_occurrence, drug_exposure, procedure_occurrence, device_exposure, measurement, observation, specimen, payer_plan_period, note, death.

tables.name: visit_linkages
tables.description: Helper: repeated visit_occurrence_id and visit_detail_id foreign keys.
notes: Tables referencing visit_occurrence.visit_occurrence_id include visit_detail, condition_occurrence, drug_exposure, procedure_occurrence, device_exposure, measurement, observation, note.
Tables referencing visit_detail.visit_detail_id include condition_occurrence, drug_exposure, procedure_occurrence, device_exposure, measurement, observation, note.
